hero.headline:
Stop Swiping.
Start Dating.
hero.subtitle: One real date every week. No endless swiping, no ghosting, just genuine connections.

mission:
Match&Meet believes that everyone shines with their own raw, gem-like beauty.
We guide our users to explore their charm through new connections
and to discover the kind of person who truly complements them.
That’s our mission.

swipeHell.title: 🔄 Endless Swipe Hell
swipeHell.description: Hundreds of swipes daily, but zero real dates. Just wasting time and getting exhausted.

ghosting.title: 👻 Ghosting Culture
ghosting.description: Lots of chats but no actual meetups. Even when plans are made, people flake constantly.

topTen.title: 💸 Top 10% Monopoly
topTen.description: A few attractive profiles get all the matches. Regular people don't stand a chance.

fakeProfiles.title: 🤖 Fake Profile Flood
fakeProfiles.description: Photo scams, fake accounts, and bots everywhere. Finding real people is nearly impossible.

noFlaking.title: 📅 Real Dates Only.
noFlaking.description: 3 matches weekly → Choose 1 → Meet for real. Flake? Next week's matches paused. Only committed people remain.

timeSaving.title: ⏰ Just 5 Minutes a Day
timeSaving.description: No endless swiping. Check once a week. Choose → Meet → Done.

realisticMatching.title: 🎯 Real People At Your Level
realisticMatching.description: No model-level profiles. No top 10% monopoly. Match with similar people. Realistic connections that actually work.

personalGrowth.title: 📈 Grow With Every Date
personalGrowth.description: Meet someone new every week. Improve your dating skills. Better understanding of what you want. Become a better dater.

safeDating.title: ✅ Safe & Verified
safeDating.description: Real name verification. Profile screening. Report system. Fake accounts instantly banned.

emailSignup.title: 🔥 Currently Improving Algorithm
emailSignup.subtitle: New signups temporarily paused.
emailSignup.benefit3: ✅ Pay after your first free match.
emailSignup.successMessage: ✅ Thank you! We'll notify you immediately when ready.
